name: Together in Space (MYline media)
description:
The game was developed during the week specifically for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. It was created by four people: Zone " Xag " Aguilar-artist, Soler-artist, MYline media-programmer, Antreek Games-programmer https://antreek-games.itch.io/.

You play as a crew that has crashed in an unknown corner of the galaxy. All but you have been captured by the aliens. Find the entire crew using the Ascii code table and fly the spaceship away from this place.
